basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Phil Ball Football Coaching Scholarship
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Committee will consider commitment to a career in football coaching, leadership qualities, moral character and financial need
basic_information.committee_name: Dr. Phil Ball Football Coaching Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to a full time undergraduate or graduate student within the College of Education & Professional Studies who is a coaching assistant in football. Eligibility Requirements Pursuing a degree in the Department of Kinesiology and Health Studies Must be a full-time undergraduate or graduate student 2.5 GPA or higher No disciplinary or academic probation on record Committee will consider commitment to a career in football coaching, leadership qualities, moral, and character Financial needs considered Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
